data.eml:eml: First cavernicolous trechine beetle discovered in Guilin karst, northeastern Guangxi (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Feifei, Tian, Mingyi (2015): First cavernicolous trechine beetle discovered in Guilin karst, northeastern Guangxi (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Trechinae). ZooKeys 545: 119-129, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.545.6111, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.545.6111
